#summary running the code and its result
= Running the Code =
Due to the nature of this project,
it is not necessary to build the binary and run it yourself in most cases.

Also, please be informed that, by default, the program generates huge tables of total 900MB!
They are to cache the computed result for later execution.
If you are going to find your own set of matching templates,
it would be beneficial.

Otherwise, it is only a waste of your disk space.
I attach the console output below instead.
Also, the generated tables are included in the solution and committed in the repository.
Please find ~table.h files in [http://code.google.com/p/simple-voxels/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk trunk].
